SELECT c.user_id AS userId, u.username AS username, ui.truename AS truename, ui.idcard AS idcard, b.account AS account, b.bank AS bankcode, b.card_type AS cardType, CASE WHEN b.card_type = 1 OR b.card_type = 2 THEN '是' WHEN b.card_type = 0 THEN '否' ELSE '' END AS isdefault, CASE WHEN b.card_type = 0 OR b.card_type = 1 THEN '普通提现卡' WHEN b.card_type = 2 THEN '快捷支付卡' ELSE '' END AS bankShuxing,
b.create_time AS addtime FROM ht_user u INNER JOIN ht_account_chinapnr c ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_account_bank b ON c.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_user_info ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id
ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
